title: Portfolio

title: Artistry

title: CashTrack

title: flipZone

title: News App
description: Depicts a dummy news website with a predefined set of news data.

description: A real-time web-app implementing pagination to display the weather of over 30 Indian cities.

title: College Proctor
description: A one-step solution for every student, teacher and proctor that automates every step in any type of assessment from creating and taking a test to automated results and evaluation.

title: netflix clone
description: Explore a Netflix-inspired website clone offering a vast library of movies and series, with the added feature of viewing trailers.

title: Secrets
description: Reveals personalized secret sentences to users upon successful login for enhanced privacy and security

title: Instapaw
